title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name 

of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 26 March 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited foreign affair (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 26 march 2025

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha and, in the English language, 
the Department of Foreign Affairs, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an 
Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha agus Trádála and, in the English language, to that of 
the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn gnothai eachtracha english language department foreign affair altered irish language roinn gnothai eachtracha agus tradala english language department foreign affair trade

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Gnóthaí Eachtracha and, in the 
English language, the Minister for Foreign Affairs, is altered, in the Irish 
language, to that of an tAire Gnóthaí Eachtracha agus Trádála and, in the English 
language, to that of the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire gnothai eachtracha english language minister foreign affair altered irish language taire gnothai eachtracha agus tradala english language minister foreign affair trade

title: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Foreign Affairs (Alteration of Name
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

references to the Department of Foreign Affairs shall be 
construed as references to the Department of Foreign Affairs and 
Trade, and 

(b) 

references to the Minister for Foreign Affairs shall be construed 
as references to the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
25 March, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [106] 3
